resources.string:
Hi, my name is J. 

I love chilling with friends. 

We take alcohol and most times get baked. 
Fun fact is that we are all out going people and hate bad energy. 

We play party games like truth and dare a lot. 
But this time, i want to switch things up 
By introducing my friends to Peke J 

Two of my friends will imitate the actions they see in the game, while i hold the phone to either skip or continue 

I'll total the points each couple get and at the end, losers run around naked and winners take 3 tequila shots. 
You should ask mazakpe about this game on twitter @makpalyy, all questions will be answered.
